name: typedoc-vuepress-theme
description: A TypeDoc plugin to build API documentation to be consumed with VuePress.
author: Thomas Grey

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.docs: rm -rf ./demo && npm run build && typedoc --options ../../stubs/typedoc.json --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --vuepressVersion "v2" --plugin ./dist/index --out ./out
